scripts.build:all: pnpm build:tokens && pnpm build:icons && pnpm build:ui
scripts.publish:all: pnpm build:all && pnpm --filter @bui/tokens publish && pnpm --filter @bui/icons publish && pnpm --filter @bui/ui publish
scripts.version:patch: pnpm --filter @bui/tokens version patch && pnpm --filter @bui/icons version patch && pnpm --filter @bui/ui version patch
scripts.version:minor: pnpm --filter @bui/tokens version minor && pnpm --filter @bui/icons version minor && pnpm --filter @bui/ui version minor
scripts.version:major: pnpm --filter @bui/tokens version major && pnpm --filter @bui/icons version major && pnpm --filter @bui/ui version major
scripts.publish:dry-run: pnpm build:all && pnpm --filter @bui/tokens publish --dry-run && pnpm --filter @bui/icons publish --dry-run && pnpm --filter @bui/ui publish --dry-run
